summary: The "Rhine International Navigation Consortium," now redirected to the preferred term "European Barge Union," represents a significant entity within the framework of European organisations focused on inland navigation. This consortium plays a pivotal role in advocating for the interests of barge operators and promoting sustainable navigation practices on the Rhine River and beyond. In the context of EU legal and regulatory documents, the European Barge Union engages in lobbying for harmonized regulations, enhancing safety standards, and fostering environmental protection measures. Its activities are crucial for ensuring compliance with EU directives aimed at improving the efficiency and sustainability of inland waterway transport.
